Major_Arcs.title: Setting the Stage in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town and initial character interactions and conflicts setting up the main storylines.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Setting and Initial Dialogue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the setting in a saloon and introduces the initial conversations and character dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Scene Setting
The Blonde Woman's Explanation
Conversation Continues - Man's Response and Old Timers' Wisdom

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town's Impending Demolition and Cowboy's Nostalgia
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the arrival of modern surveyors and the threat to demolish Ghost Town, contrasted with a cowboy's nostalgic reflection on the town's past.

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy's Departure and Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the cowboy's farewell and his melancholic thoughts about the Ghost Town's past beauty.

narrative_arcs.title: Cowboy's Farewell and Nostalgic Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Modern Surveyors and Demolition Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the surveyors and their plans to demolish Ghost Town for an airport, creating conflict and emotional reactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Modern Arrival and Ghost Town Observation
Airport Plan and Town Demolition Imminent
Emotional Reaction to Ghost Town's Destruction

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Relationship Troubles Amidst Town's Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the personal relationship conflicts between Nan and Cal, intertwined with the backdrop of the Ghost Town demolition and business dealings.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Argument and Nan's Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan and Cal's argument and Nan's internal reflection on their past relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Accusation and Cal's Defense
Woman's Reflection on Past Relationship with Cal

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Outburst at Demolition Site
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the surveyor woman's emotional breakdown and confrontation at the demolition site.

narrative_arcs.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Woman's Outburst

sub_scenes.title: Business Discussions and Father-Daughter Conflict over Horses
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces business discussions about cattle shipping and airport logistics, leading to a conflict between Nan and her father about providing horses for construction.

narrative_arcs.title: Cattle Shipping and Airport Business Discussion
Horses for Construction and Father-Daughter Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Nan's family reassuring her about Cal's love, but Nan decides to seek clarity directly from Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance of Cal's Love
Nan's Resolve to Seek Clarity

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit of Cal and Business Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan chasing after Cal, only to be interrupted by her father with business obligations.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing Cal
Horse Business Interruption
Business Deal and Commitment

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Heated Conversation and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a tense conversation between Nan and Cal leading to Cal's departure and Nan's reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Intense Conversation and Impending Departure
Cal's Departure
Reaction to Departing Horses

sub_scenes.title: Time Skip and Cal's Return with Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a time skip and Cal's return to confess his love to Nan.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Skip and Nan's Longing Narration
Cal's Return and Confession of Love

Major_Arcs.title: Snowstorm Crisis and Relief
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a natural disaster crisis - a severe snowstorm - and its impact on the town and livestock, culminating in a hopeful resolution with external aid.

sub_scenes.title: Reunion in Snow and Weather Report
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with Nan and Cal's reunion in the snow and transitions to a dire weather report.

narrative_arcs.title: Reunion and Unease in the Snow
Arrival at the Snowy Homestead and Weather Report

sub_scenes.title: Livestock Concern and Narrative Description of Snowfall
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the immediate concerns about livestock and a narrative description of the relentless snowfall.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern Over Livestock and Fodder Shortage
Assessing the Snow's Severity and Nan's Concern
Narrative Description of Relentless Snowfall
Cal's Decisive Action to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts initial despair turning into hope with the arrival of a plane carrying fodder, leading to a romantic resolution between Nan and Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Indoor Despair and a Glimmer of Hope
Plane Arrives with Fodder
Hope and Romantic Reassurance

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Jeff's Gun Obsession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new character, Chane Benson, and focuses on Jeff's admiration and gun obsession, setting up potential conflicts related to law and order.

sub_scenes.title: Showdown in Cowtown and Character Debate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a showdown in Cowtown and presents varying opinions on his character.

narrative_arcs.title: Showdown and Reactions in Cowtown
Debate on Chane Benson's Character
Dismissive Reaction and Age Critique

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Gun Obsession and Confrontation with Sally
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Sally's concern about Jeff's gun obsession and her attempts to confront and guide him away from it.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood
Gun Obsession Critique
Confrontation over Gun Cleaning
Lectures and Disobedience
Plea for Decency
Clyde Surratt Admiration
Boasting and Challenge to Clyde Surratt
Violent Threat and Laughter

sub_scenes.title: Planning to Help Jeff and Unsettling Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Sally and Pete planning to help Jeff, contrasting with a narrative reflection on Shane Benson's unsettling demeanor.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning to Help Jeff
Reaffirming Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Sarcastic Remark
Narrative Reflection on Shane Benson's Demeanor

Major_Arcs.title: Conflict over Clyde's Article and Benson's Reaction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the publication of Clyde's article criticizing Chane Benson, leading to fear, confrontation, and a dinner invitation.

sub_scenes.title: Article Confrontation and Sally's Fear
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate reaction to Clyde's article, including Sally's fear for Clyde's safety.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article
Sally's Fear and Clyde's Reassurance

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Confrontation and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Benson's confrontation with Sally and Surrett, leading to a dinner invitation as a way to understand him better.

narrative_arcs.title: Benson's Confrontation and Justification for Staying
Benson Justifies His Stance and Criticizes Clyde
Sally and Surrett Discuss Clyde's Article and Benson's Impact
Considering Inviting Chane Benson for Dinner
Discussing Chane's Skills and Dinner Invitation

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner with Benson and Jeff's Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the dinner with Chane Benson, Jeff's jealous reaction and violent outburst, and the ensuing chase to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Polite Dinner Conversation and Moonlit Walk
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the initial polite interaction during the dinner and a seemingly pleasant moonlit walk between Sally and Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Polite Conversation and Departure for Moonlight Walk

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Jealous Attack and Sally's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jeff's jealous confrontation, physical assault, and Sally's angry response.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Jealous Confrontation
Escalating Aggression and Unwanted Kiss
Sally's Angry Retort and Accusations

sub_scenes.title: Post-Kiss Conversation and Chase to Save Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the conversation after the kiss, Chane's retaliation, and the urgent chase to save Clyde from Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Kiss Conversation and Jeff's Justification
Chane's Retaliation and Threat, Sally's Urgent Plea
Desperate Ride to Save Clyde
Confrontation Inside the Newspaper Office
Benson's Challenge and Chane's Departure with Clyde
Anxious Wait and Sally's Regret
Headline Change Order
Newspaper Partnership and Sally's Pride

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Betsy and Steve's Romance Amidst Ranch Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new romantic storyline between Betsy and Steve, set against the backdrop of ranch troubles and potential conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and New Boss Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a ranch setting with a physical confrontation and the introduction of Steve Daley as the new boss.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Gender Insult
Introduction of Steve Daley as the Boss
Discussion of Trouble with the New Boss

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Unease and Ranch Troubles Discussion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy's initial unease with Steve and her discussion with Hank about ranch problems and suspicions.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Interaction and Betsy's Unease with Steve
Ranch Troubles and Suspicions of Double K
Trip to Town and Hank's Orders for Betsy

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Bar Fight Interlude
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation in town and an unrelated bar fight scene interlude.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges at the Store
Bar Fight and Aftermath

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Realization and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Betsy's realization about Steve's nature, her change of heart about firing him, and her confession of love.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Realization about Steve and Ranch Decision
Betsy's Change of Heart and Hank's Suggestion
Betsy's Confession to Steve

sub_scenes.title: Negotiation and Steve Giving Up Gun
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy and Steve negotiating the terms of their relationship, culminating in Steve agreeing to give up his gun as a proof of love.

narrative_arcs.title: Negotiating Terms and Gunfighter Identity
Love Confession and a Difficult Request
The Ultimate Proof of Love and a Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflict Escalation and Near-Death Experience
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalation of ranch conflict, leading to violence and Steve's near-death experience at Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Escalating Threats at Ranch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Old Man Bridges' accusations, escalating threats, and Betsy's firm stance.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Demands at the Ranch
Escalating Threats and Betsy's Firm Stance
Reflection on Violence and Foreshadowing of Attack

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Plea and Ride to Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Betsy trying to dissuade Hank and Steve, leading to Steve's departure and Betsy's ride to Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Plea and Hank's Determination
Desperate Plea and Steve's Resolve
Betsy's Contemplation and Impending Action
Ride to Devil's Pass and Ceasefire

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation, Shooting and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation at Devil's Pass, Steve getting shot, Betsy's reaction, and their emotional reunion.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Initial Confrontation
Capture, Debate, and Shooting of Steve
Betsy's Faint and Reunion with Steve
Relief and Reflection on Survival
Romantic Declaration and Future Together

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred Love Triangle and Ranch Fence Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new love triangle involving Carrie, Dave, and Fred, intertwined with a ranch fencing dispute and escalating conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Sulking and Flashback to Ranch Trouble
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dave sulking and transitions into a flashback explaining the ranch fencing conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Sulking and Rebuke
Flashback to Curley's Arrival at the Corral
News of Fencing and Range Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Ranchers' Fence Confrontation and Planning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the ranchers' confrontation at the fence line and their planning to manage the herd amidst the fencing conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranchers Discuss the New Fence
Confrontation at the Fence Line
Planning to Secure the Herd
Escalating Tension with Fred Gordon
Curley Intervenes to Prevent Violence
Disarming and Expulsion of Fred Gordon and Brother
Aftermath and Assertion of Ranch Ownership

sub_scenes.title: Carrie and Dave's Conflicted Feelings and Fred's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Carrie and Dave's complicated feelings for each other and Fred, culminating in Fred's unexpected arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Reluctant Friendship and Brotherly Disdain
Defense of Fred's Actions and Implicit Feelings
Confession of Conflicted Feelings
Seeking Honesty and Deeper Conversation
Affirmation of the Current Relationship
Internal Monologue of Perceived Unspoken Love
Sudden Interruption and Confrontational Inquiry
Accusation and Defensive Stance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation Resolution and Romantic Development with Fred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the confrontation with Fred, leading to Carrie and Fred's romantic development and marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Attempt to De-escalate and Initial Refusal
Accusation of Heartbreak and Questioning Conclusions
Declaration of Possessiveness and Protectiveness
Confession of Love Trigger and Reassurance
Brotherly Reconciliation and Movie Invitation
Flashback of Budding Romance and Anticipation
Marriage Proposal and Acceptance

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract Misunderstanding and Carrie's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals a misunderstanding about the Carlton contract, leading to Carrie's angry reaction and accusations.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern and Misinterpretation Regarding Dave's Feelings
Clarification of Misunderstanding and Business Motives
Revelation of Selfishness and Business Priority
Angry Accusation of Deception and Trickery
Desperate Plea and Rejection of Affection
Internal Reflection on Suspicion and Motivation
Confrontation and Inquiry about Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Confrontation and Emotional Resolution with Dave
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's confrontation with Mr. Carlton, her emotional aftermath, and reconciliation with Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation and Impatience Before Confrontation
Direct Confrontation with Mr. Carlton
Accusation of Trickery and Business Betrayal
Defiant Assertion of Independence and Self-Reliance
Emotional Aftermath and Reflection of Foolishness
Reconciliation and Comfort in Affection

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Departure and Final Conversation with Dave
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks Carrie's decision to leave the West and her final conversation with Dave, expressing lingering emotions and pride.

narrative_arcs.title: Relief and Lingering Pain After Decision
Distant Reunion in Town After Weeks Apart
Inquiry and Confirmation of Love
Riding Back and Discussing Past and Present Feelings

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance's Escape and Final Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk's escape and pursuit by the Marshal, leading to a violent confrontation and Dirk's ultimate fate.

sub_scenes.title: Concern for Carrie and Visitor Arrivals
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows concern for Carrie's health and the arrival of visitors, setting a worried atmosphere.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern and Arrival of Visitors
Father's Scolding about Beef Contract
Confrontation and Unhappiness Regarding a Promise
Reflection, Embrace, and Reconciliation

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Summons and Discovery of Dirk's Injury
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris urgently summoning Dirk and the subsequent discovery of Dirk's gunshot wound.

narrative_arcs.title: Bedroom Interruption and Urgent Summons
Discovery of Gunshot Wound and Reassurance

sub_scenes.title: Discussion about Dirk's Fight and Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a discussion about Dirk's fight and the arrival of Marshal Rance Cready at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Dirk's Fight and Empty Gun
Marshal Rance Cready's Arrival and Ranch Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Legal Duty and Decision to Stay
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Marshal's legal duty to capture Dirk and his subsequent decision to stay and give Dirk a chance.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Injured Man and Introduction of Dirk's Situation
Debate on Duty, Justice, and Decision to Stay for Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reconciliation and Urgent Rescue Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves romantic reconciliation between Chris and Rance, immediately followed by Chris's urgent plea to rescue Dirk.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Reconciliation after Argument
Urgent Plea to Rescue Dirk
Contemplating Rescue Strategy and Legal Implications

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Violent Confrontation with Marshal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dirk's escape attempt, the persistent pursuit by the Marshal, and the violent confrontation resulting in the Marshal being shot.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Pursuit Begins
Failed Evasion and Pursuit Persistence
Confrontation, Shooting, and Aid
Disagreement on Fate of the Marshal

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Departure and Rance's Recovery leading to Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dirk and Chris leaving, Dirk's confession of love for Rance, and Rance's subsequent recovery leading to a marriage proposal from Chris.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure and Difficult Decision
Confession of Love and Understanding
Rance's Defiance and Acceptance of Escape
Rance's Awakening and Father's Relief
Doctor's Inquiry and Father's Explanation
Confession and Proposal

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Dramatic Interruption leading to Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the wedding day preparations, Dirk's dramatic interruption, and his ultimate capture, resolving the Dirk storyline.

narrative_arcs.title: Mary and Chris's Confessions and Fears
Wedding Day is Here, but Dirk is Missing
Dirk Interrupts the Wedding and Confrontation
Marshal's Plan, Dirk's Capture and Backstory Revealed
